alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:55AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds Today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Strong southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 to 55 mph. Occasional gusts of 60 to 70 mph are possible in more wind prone areas like Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper and Red Canyon. * WHERE...Natrona County and southern portions of Fremont County, including Jeffrey City and Red Canyon/South Pass. * WHEN..Today through this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists should prepare for sudden strong gusts if traveling along these roads especially along Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Mountains East
